TopicTitle: How to translate the contracts text into other language

Articles.Content:
Hi everyone~!

Could someone tell me that how to translate the brief of contracts into other language? Because in China, most players are difficult to understand what mean in English, so I have an idea that translate some game text into Chinese by modifying .cfg file. But I can't fine which file content the brief of contracts. Could someone tell me where I can fine this file?

Hi, you may be interested in this project which uses module manager to edit the text within KSP.

You will find files containing the text for the contracts and the science report in /GameData/Squad/Resources/

Hope this helps!

2 hours ago, sal_vager said:

Hi, you may be interested in this project which uses module manager to edit the text within KSP.

You will find files containing the text for the contracts and the science report in /GameData/Squad/Resources/

Hope this helps!

Thank you so much. The International Project is great. So, how could I take part in the project? Just upload the file to Github?
I guess contacting the members running the project would be the best way to start.
